DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect high dose low dose Atorvastatin reduction level C-reactive protein ( CRP ) patient unstable angina NSTEMI ( Non ST Elevation MI ) attend Shahid Mohammadi hospital Bandar Abbas .
DOC.brief_title: High Dose Low Dose Atorvastatin Patients With Unstable Angina NSTEMI ( Non ST Elevation MI )
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare effect 80mg atorvastatin follow two 20mg daily atorvastatin three 80mg daily atorvastatin reduction CRP patient unstable angina NSTEMI ( Non ST Elevation MI ) attend Shahid Mohammadi hospital Bandar Abbas 2009 .
DOC.criteria: Patients unstable angina chest discomfort rest normal EKG St depression ( least 0.1mv ) two consecutive lead new deep T inversion ( least 0.2mv ) Myocardial Infarction ST elevation Diabetes Mellitus Previous statin use Current infectious disease
